description.value:
Rare weapon (dagger)
Of star-forged steel and adamant, the star dagger is a beautiful +3 dagger that glows with a cold, actinic light. All invisible creatures within 60 feet of the unsheathed blade lose their invisibility at once and are covered in faerie fire. More than one assassin has been foiled by the Star Daggerâ€™s clear light.
